description.description-text: I am a dedicated and compassionate individual, who has a strong commitment to volunteer work and community service. I currently am in the International Baccalaureate (IB) program at Glenforest Secondary School and have been in the MYP program for 3 years during my time at Bristol Road Middle School. I currently have a range of volunteer experience and am consistently looking to build my social skills through more experienced jobs. I am certified in first aid, CPR, and have completed my national lifeguard course.
